Name: HytaleCrates
Description: A crate and key reward system with casino-style animations

Permissions.Name: crates.use
Permissions.Description: Allows players to use crates and preview rewards

Permissions.Name: crates.admin
Permissions.Description: Allows operators to manage crates, give keys, and reload config

Commands.Name: crateset
Commands.Description: Set the block you're looking at as a crate

Commands.Name: crateremove
Commands.Description: Remove the crate from the block you're looking at

Commands.Name: crateopen
Commands.Description: Open the crate you're looking at (requires key in hand)
